title: Cog
brief_description: A 2D digitally composited animation, with a distinctive 3D look. The mechanical, metalloid, surreal environment, as well as the characters, were created from real life cut-outs (from photographs) of everyday objects. COG is a parable about the beauty of life being ground down by an industrial society.
